author: jwasinger
content: If you can generate some SSZ-encoded access lists from your test vectors, that would be helpful for cross-validating with the geth implementation

author: jwasinger
content: the geth impl seems to work reliably on sepolia, and the generated access lists look correct based on the ones I've manually examined.

author: nero_eth
content: great to hear and yeah, will create some BALs and add them

author: nero_eth
content:
Put some BALs into the repo:
